full_summary:
**Title**
ACAN - Rooftop, Carrier VVT and Controls Preventative Maintenance Services
**Reference Number**
9F023-20230329, 5FB59

**Legal Status**
This is a Pre-qualified Contract Award Notice (ACAN) announced on May 26, 2023.

**Requirements**
The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) is seeking maintenance services for Carrier Variable Volume and variable Temperature (VVT) & Energy Monitoring & Control Systems (EMCS) at the David Florida Laboratory (DFL).  The scope includes preventative maintenance and weekly inspections of rooftop units, VVT (controls and devices) and monitor Building Automation systems controlling these devices.

The proposed maintenance services will ensure that the systems remain operational and within required setting limits at all times. The successful bidder must have expert personnel trained by Carrier in the i-Vu control system to perform preventative maintenance, repairs, and adjustments.

**Pre-qualified Supplier**
The pre-qualified supplier is an expert in the Carrier i-Vu control system and has extensive knowledge and experience serving the equipment and the associated support by Carrier manufacture with original parts. 

**Duration and Option**
The proposed contract is for a period of two (2) years, from July 1st, 2023 to June 30th, 2025. The contractor has granted to the government of Canada an irrevocable option to extend the term of this contract by five (5) years under the same terms and conditions.

**Notice of Interest**
Interested suppliers must submit a statement of capabilities on or before June 9, 2023 if they wish to be considered for this contract.
